description:
Horror novelist Stefan Van Croven has been pierced through the chest with a wooden stake! Richard is convinced that the answer is right under his nose, but he doesn’t know that Conan’s figured out the trick!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le meurtre de la villa Dracula (2)
คดีฆาตกรรมปราสาทแดร็กคิวล่า (ตอนจบ)
ドラキュラ荘殺人事件 (後編)
